description:
After being rescued from the cave, Kazuma and the others meet the King of Monaco, who apologizes for all of the threats they’ve faced and offers them any ingredient they wish. In exchange though, they must answer his question!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La question du prince ! Qui mange le pain en premier ?
Ou-sama no Shitsumon!! Oishisou na Pan o Saisho ni Tabesaseru no wa?
The King`s Question!! Who Would You First Serve Delicious Bread To?
คำถามของพระราชา!! ขนมปังที่น่าอร่อยจะให้ใครกินคนแรก?
王様の質問!! 美味しそうなパンを最初に食べさせるのは?
